title: Online Language Lesson Design Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary language education theory and in-person teaching experience
context.additional_context: A program aimed at strengthening the design competencies of pre-service and in-service elementary school teachers in transitioning face-to-face classes to online instruction, operating within a limited technological environment centered around smartphones.

learning_goals: Can restructure face-to-face class activities into interactive activities suitable for online learning environments.
Can design assessment methods to measure language learning outcomes using LMS-based evaluation tools.
Can establish strategies for producing and utilizing effective language learning content in smartphone environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
